import React, { Component } from 'react'; class Statos extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = [ { id: 1, img: 'https://picsum.photos/60', name: 'omarz', work: 'web designer', phone: '+49 123456', email: 'omarz@gmail.com' }, { id: 2, img: 'https://picsum.photos/61', name: 'omarz', work: 'web designer', phone: '+49 123456', website: "www.space.com" }, { id: 3, img: 'https://picsum.photos/62', name: 'omarz', work: 'web designer', phone: '+49 123456', email: 'omarz@gmail.com', website: 'www.lol.com' }, { id: 4, img: 'https://picsum.photos/63', name: 'omarz', work: 'web designer', phone: '+49 123456', email: 'omarz@gmail.com' } ] } render() { return (

{this.state.name}

{this.state.work}

{this.state.phone}

{this.state.email ? "" : 'there is no email'} {this.state.email}

{this.state.website}

) } } export default Statos
